query: How can I convert an audio file to text?
response_text: You’ve got a few easy options—pick based on whether you want quick, free, or automated.  Fast & simple (no setup)  Google Docs → Tools → Voice typing (play the audio near your mic)  Otter.ai → upload audio, good accuracy for meetings  Notta / Sonix / Descript → upload → get text in minutes  On your phone  iPhone: Voice Memos → share → transcribe (iOS 17+)  Android: Google Recorder → auto-transcribes  Offline / technical (best control)  OpenAI Whisper  bashCopy codepip install whisper  whisper audio.mp3 --model small  Already on YouTube?  Upload → use auto-captions → download transcript  If you tell me file type, language, and whether you want free vs highest accuracy, I’ll point you to the best exact option.
